title: Honor level
body: I was banned for 14 days,  2 or 3 months ago and my honor level was locked at 0, after 1 month my honor was unlocked, now after 1-2 months, my honor level is still 0... Why is it so hard to rankup my honor level after i got a 14 days ban?

replies.body: Getting your honor back up isn't just about getting honors from players, but to consistently play as an honorable and stand up summoner.  If you have any matches in between that aren't sportsmanlike or cause others a negative experience then it can slow down your progress.  You can always reach out to the PB team in a ticket if you'd like any context on matches like that!
